channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ

item.title: Report X-2024030331
item.description:
Report X-2024030331

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-19T15:11:49+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-05
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2024030331 SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE ARRIVED AT THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE. UPON INSPECTION ONE BOTTLE OF ZEP MORADO SUPER CLEANER WAS FOUND TO LEAKING. IT HAS APPOROXIMATELY 15% OF LEAKAGE. THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURN TO THE SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF ZEP MORADO SUPER CLEANER CAUSED FROM THE PACKAGE BEING DROPPED OR MISHANDLED. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION. 2. X-2024030332 SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE ARRIVED AT THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE. UPON INSPECTION TWO BOTTLES OF ZEP INDUSTRIAL PURPLE DEGREASER WAS FOUND TO BE MISSING AND ONE SLIGHTLY LEAKING. THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURNED TO SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF ZEP INDUSTRIAL PURPLE DEGREASER CAUSED FROM THE PACKAGE BEING DROPPED OR MISHANDLED. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2024030244
item.description:

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-01
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE ARRIVED AT THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE. UPON INSPECTION 1 STEEL DRUM TREMCO PUMA WAS FOUND WITH A DENT IN THE BOTTOM THAT CAUSED LEAKAGE. IT WAS HURRIEDLY PLACE IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE SCRAPPED UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF TREMCO PUMA CAUSED FROM IT BEING DROPPED OR MISHANDLED. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: STEEL DRUM WAS PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSTION.

DescribePack: FAILURE OF NOBEL LOW TEMP SAN CAUSED FROM THE PKG BEING DROPPED OR MISHANDLED. DurationRel: 24 and MitigateEffect: THE CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINE A SALVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived at hazmat during sunrise sort in a plastic bin. DescribePack: Inspection showed package of "ZEP CALCIUM, LIME & RUST STAIN REMOVER" to be wet with internal leakage, and 1 of 4 items with a loose cap. Damage most likely caused from being dropped or mishandled. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Remaining contents will be returned to shipper in a salvage drum, unless otherwise stated.

item.description:
Report X-2024030355

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-14T18:15:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-05
  • City: DAYTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WHILE PACKAGE WAS BEING UNLOADED PACKAGE HANDLER NOTICED BOX WAS WET AND PUT THE PACKAGE IN A HAZMAT TOTE. THEN BROUGHT PACKAGE TO QA FOR FURTHER INSPECTION. DescribePack: CAP WAS LOOSE TO PRODUCT CAUSING CONTENTS TO LEAK. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE HANDLER PLACE PACKAGE IN A HAZMAT TOTE AND BROUGHT TO QA. THEN QA BROUGHT PACKAGE TO HAZMAT CAGE AND PLACED IN A LINED HAZMAT DRUM FOR FURTER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024030326
item.description:
Report X-2024030326

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-05
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: IT APPEARS THE SHIPMENT WAS REMOVED FROM THE SYSTEM FLOW, DUE TO THE EXTERNAL CARTON BEING TORN AND WET DURING THE DAY SORT. DescribePack: UPON INSPECTION IT WAS DISCOVERS FISHER SCIENTIFIC ACTETIC ACID, GLARICAL 20 LITERS PLASTIC DRUM HAD A LEAK THAT APPEARED TO BE CAUSED BY A SPILT IN THE SEEM OF THE DRUM UNDER THE DRUM HANDLE. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: FACILITY PROCEDURES FOR DAMAGED HAZARDOUS MATERIAL FOLLOWED, CONTENTS CONTAINED AND AWAITING DISPOSITION.

item.description:
Report X-2024030519

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-20
  • City: Branchburg
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 2/20/2024 at approximately 1700, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 5458396 at the station location in Branchburg, reporting a corrosive spill. This package consisted of fiberboard box containing a plastic bottle, all inside of an outer fiberboard box. The shipment appeared to leak during transport, resulting in spillage. The shipment was placed in a salvage drum and is waiting to be picked up by the shipper.

item.title: Report X-2024030173
item.description:
Report X-2024030173

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-15T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-27
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package arrived at hazmat cage during Twi sort with signs of damages due to internal leaking. The package and its contents were inspected and ad one (1) of the four (4) bottles had a puncture close to the cap. Contents were then removed from damaged fiberboard box and placed in lined salvage drum to await disposition. DescribePack: The package failure was possibly due to contents being poorly and improperly repack. The puncture/hole was the size of a pin hole. An approximate amount of 1/4 of the liquid content in the bottle leaked out. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: The contents were placed properly in a lined salvage drum to prevent further leakage or damages.

item.title: Report X-2024030168
item.description:
Report X-2024030168

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-15T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-27
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: IT APPEARS THE SHIPMENT WAS REMOVED FROM THE SYSTEM FLOW, DUE TO THE EXTERNAL CARTON BEING PUNCTURED. DescribePack: UPON INSPECTION IT WAS DISCOVERED A PLASTIC DRUM OF 20 LITERS OF FISHER SCIENTIFIC ACETIC ACID, GLACIAL HAD A PUNCTURE IN THE BODY OF THE CONTAINER AND CAUSED LEAKAGING ALLOWING 20% SPILLAGE. BUT THE ACTUAL SEEM OF THE PLASTIC DRUM SPLIT WHICH THEN MADE IT APPEAR AS OF THE DRUM WAS PUNCTURED. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: FACILITY PROCEDURES FOR DAMAGED HAZARDOUS MATERIAL FOLLOWED, CONTENTS CONTAINED AND AWAITING DISPOSITION.

UPON INSPECTION 3 OF 4 BOTTLES ZEP CALCIUM LIME AND RUST REMOVER WAS FOUND TO BE MISSING THE REMAINING BOTTLE WAS 10% LEAKED OUT. IT WAS PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE SCRAPPED UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF ZEP CALCIUM LIME AND RUST REMOVER CAUSED FROM THE PACKAGE BEING DROPPED OR MISHANDLED. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: CONTENT WAS PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION UNLESS OTHERWISE.

item.title: Report X-2024030194
item.description:
Report X-2024030194

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-14T18:15:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-29
  • City: DOVER
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During sort package leaking white paint. On inspection, identified one of two inner cans of paint was bent significantly enough to force lid to open and cause leak. Additionally paint is a hazmat however it was shipped undeclared with no hazmat decal markings. DescribePack: Paint can bent causing paint to leak throughout box. No inner packing used to minimize shipping impact DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: once identified, package was separated from other sort packages and placed in a hazmat bag in bin for further processing.
